articles.title: 'What a disgrace': Fans erupt over 'disgusting' moment at Euro 2020 - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Ethan Ampadu became the youngest player to receive a straight red card in the history of the European Championships. Watch the incident here.
articles.content:
Ethan Ampadu left the field in tears after his straight red card against Italy. Image: Getty

articles.title: Oh dear, Ursula! Viktor Orban blasts ‘imperialist’ Brussels which seeks ‘European empire’ - Daily Express
articles.description: HUNGARIAN prime minister Viktor Orban has blasted 'imperialistic' Brussels politicians, whom he accused of seeking to build 'a European empire'.

articles.title: China passes 1 billion mark for Covid-19 vaccine doses administered - The Straits Times
articles.description: But its vaccine coverage is still lagging behind that of the US, Britain and leading European nations.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: Europe starts building up electric car battery capacity - manilastandard.net
articles.description: PARIS―As electric car sales soar, Europe has started to build up its capacity to produce batteries on the continent but it remains far from reducing its dependence on Asia.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Gosens gains glorious revenge on Ronaldo as Germany stun Portugal in Euro 2020 cracker - Goal.com
articles.description: The 2021 Euros feature 24 teams vying for the European Championship for national teams. The tournament starts off with a round-robin group stage followed by knockout rounds through the final on July 11. Check out the latest standings and results.
